experience: You and Andrew M. both know Anila Arthanari, Eric Olsen, and 75 others
Why can't you trust the king of the jungle??
I'm not "Lion" when I tell you how tight the candidate market is right

now.  If you are having trouble identifying top talent for your open positions, give me a call or email.  My team and I are talking with new candidates daily that are passively looking for their next move!  Here is a quick snapshot of some of the top talent that we are working with.
·      Strong technical Accounting, Controls, and reporting background
·      Strengths include preparing journal entries and balance sheet reconciliations while staying within established accounting principles
·      Very technical with ad-hoc reporting and excel Guru
·      Experienced Tax Professional with Bachelor’s in Accounting and Masters in TAX from Top 10 University
·      Tax Research and compliance with tax law at federal, state and local levels
with internal reporting, strong cost analysis, and system Improvements.
·      6 years of experience in FPA and Financial Analyst Roles with Large to medium sized companies
Senior Recruitment, Staffing, and Direct Hire Consultant

• Recruit, train, and maintain top performing full-desk Account Managers and Recruiters in Technology.• Manage high volume of clients.• Successfully recruit and place a wide spectrum of candidates in Information/Technology• Pursue client and candidate leads through personal marketing.• Conduct extensive research and recruiting activities

• Provide sales contracting services for up-and-coming small businesses• Acquire new accounts and assist in business strategy development• Develop telephone scripts and standardized communications including direct mail and marketing literature • Maintain client relations, provide customer service and prepare detailed sales reports

• Assisted in the development plan for 5-star resort and master-plan golf community• Cultivated and managed all aspects of hospitality at villas, entertainment areas, and sales core• Supervised all employees and directed department heads• Hosted VIPs, special events, investor meetings and overnight guests• Directed Guest Service, F & B, and Operations• Managed scheduling, procurement, inventory, payroll, and budget

Managed janitorial and maintenance crews for multi-billion dollar contract janitorial company Supervised all employees, managed and executed all work orders, inspections, human resources, inventory, ordering, budgeting, payroll, and liaised with facility client management Handled bids, RFPs, and new project development
Michigan State University - The Eli Broad College of Business
